code: import React from'react';import{IconButton,Tooltip}from'@mui/material';import ArrowUpwardIcon from'@mui/icons-material/ArrowUpward';import ArrowDownwardIcon from'@mui/icons-material/ArrowDownward';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfileOrderButtons=_ref=>{let{profileId}=_ref;const moveUp=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');fetch(`/api/admin/profiles/${profileId}/moveUp`,{method:'PATCH',headers:{'Authorization':`Bearer ${token}`,'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(response=>{if(response.ok){window.location.reload();}else{console.error('Ошибка при перемещении профиля вверх');}}).catch(error=>{console.error('Ошибка:',error);});};const moveDown=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');fetch(`/api/admin/profiles/${profileId}/moveDown`,{method:'PATCH',headers:{'Authorization':`Bearer ${token}`,'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(response=>{if(response.ok){window.location.reload();}else{console.error('Ошибка при перемещении профиля вниз');}}).catch(error=>{console.error('Ошибка:',error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"\u041F\u0435\u0440\u0435\u043C\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0432\u044B\u0448\u0435",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:moveUp,size:"small",color:"primary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowUpwardIcon,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"\u041F\u0435\u0440\u0435\u043C\u0435\u0441\u0442\u0438\u0442\u044C \u043D\u0438\u0436\u0435",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{onClick:moveDown,size:"small",color:"primary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowDownwardIcon,{})})})]});};export default ProfileOrderButtons;
